title: Nikela kwiTempile ye-Orbital
heading: Gcwalisa uMnikelo Wakho
chooseHow: Khetha indlela ongathanda ukugqiba ngayo umnikelo wakho otsalwa irhafu:

option1.heading: Inketho 1: Nikela kwi-Intanethi ngoku
option1.description: Gcwalisa umnikelo wakho ngoko nangoko usebenzisa ikhadi letyala, ikhadi lebhanki, okanye ezinye iindlela zokuhlawula kwi-intanethi ngomxhasi wethu wemali okhuselekileyo, The Field . Uya kufumana irisithi yerhafu ngoko nangoko.

option2.heading: Ukhetho lwesi-2: Idiphozithi yeBhanki kwiRoy Foundation
option2.description: Yenza idiphozithi yebhanki ngokuthe ngqo okanye utshintshe ucingo kwi -Roy Foundation , iqabane lethu lobuchule kunye nomxhasi wemali. Olu khetho lufanelekile kwiminikelo emikhulu okanye ukudluliselwa kwamanye amazwe.
option2.instructions: Nceda uquke i-" Orbital Temple - {donationType} " kwindawo yereferensi. Emva kokugqiba ukudluliselwa kwakho, sithumele i-imeyile ku-sathi.roy@orbitaltemple.art kunye neenkcukacha zakho zokudlulisa ukuze ufumane irisithi yakho yerhafu.

taxInfo.heading: Tax-Deductible Giving
taxInfo.description: ITempile ye-Orbital yiprojekthi exhaswa ngemali ye-Fiscally (Performance Zone Inc.) , i- 501(c)(3) yombutho ongenzi nzuzo. Yonke iminikelo yase-US itsalwa irhafu ngokomthetho.
